problem_data.title: K^th Smallest Element in a Sorted Matrix
problem_data.description:
Given an n x n matrix where each of the rows and columns is sorted in ascending order, return the k^th smallest element in the matrix.

Note that it is the k^th smallest element in the sorted order, not the k^th distinct element.

You must find a solution with a memory complexity better than O(n^2).

examples.explanation: The elements in the matrix are [1,5,9,10,11,12,13,13,15], and the 8th smallest number is 13

experiment_result.error: AI 未生成任何有效測資
